title: Abuses stript, and whipt. Or Satirical essayes. By George Wyther. Diuided into two bookes
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Francis Burton, and are to be solde at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Green-Dragon,
notes: In this edition A4r line 1 of text has: whome.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print show-through; some pages tightly bound.
